#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define MOD 1000000007
int main()
{
int t;
int n;
long long int ans;
long long int x;
scanf("%d",&t);
while(t--)
{
ans=1;
scanf("%d",&n);
int quot=n/3;
int rem=n%3;
if(rem==1)
{
quot=quot-1;
x=3;
while(quot>0)
{
if(quot&1)
ans=(ans*x)%MOD;
x=(x*x)%MOD;
quot=quot>>1;
}
ans=(ans*4)%MOD;
}
else
{
x=3;
while(quot>0)
{
if(quot&1)
ans=(ans*x)%MOD;
x=(x*x)%MOD;
quot=quot>>1;
}
if(rem==2)
ans=(ans*2)%MOD;
}
if(n==1)
ans=1;
printf("%lld\n",ans);
}
return 0;
}
